queries.query: INSERT INTO TB_ARQUIVO_INPUT_COLS_DEF( ID_ARQUIVO_INPUT, NM_COLUMN, CD_TYPE, VL_LENGTH, CD_ORDEM, USER_CREATED, DT_CREATED, DT_ALTERED ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )
UPDATE TB_ARQUIVO_INPUT_COLS_DEF SET ID_ARQUIVO_INPUT = ?, NM_COLUMN = ?, CD_TYPE = ?, VL_LENGTH = ?, CD_ORDEM = ?, USER_ALTERED = ?, DT_ALTERED = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE ID = ?
